Product Title: Nude Gel Polish 6 Colors Gel Nail Polish Set with Gift Box, Soak Off UV LED Gel Polish Kit

Store: FULLSEXY
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FULLSEXY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3 x 1 inches; 8.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was kind of disappointed in this purchase the polishes aren't very pigmented so I had to do 4 coats to get it to really show the way I wanted it to and having to do that many coats uses up a LOT of the product so it isn't very cost effective not to mention very time consuming because after each coat you have to cure them under the lamp so it takes up a lot of your time
Review Title: Not very cost effective.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user continues to demonstrate a strong preference for beauty and makeup tools that prioritize convenience, efficiency, and quality in their daily routine. Their recent interactions emphasize a critical stance towards product performance, illustrating a consistent trend of disappointment with items that fail to meet high standards, particularly in terms of effectiveness and longevity. The latest review highlights their dissatisfaction with a gel polish set, citing issues with pigmentation and cost-effectiveness, which further reinforces their demand for reliable products.

Despite initial allure, such as appealing aesthetics or soft materials, the user is increasingly focused on practicality and durability. Their inclination towards functional solutions signifies a desire for beauty tools that not only enhance their routine but are also time-efficient and economical. With an average product rating of 2.0 from prior interactions, the user maintains a discerning approach, evidencing that while they are open to new improvements, they are unyielding when evaluations reveal shortcomings.

Overall, the user seeks products that deliver both functionality and quality, remaining cautious in their evaluations. They are not hesitant to articulate concerns when tools do not align with their expectations, showcasing a commitment to making informed choices in their beauty arsenal.
